main event: An observer sighted a yellow-pink-orange light traveling from the NE to the SW for about 4 seconds.
interesting points: The observation lasted for a brief duration of only 4 seconds,The light disappeared quickly after being sighted,The observer described the phenomenon as having a unique color palette of yellow, pink, and orange,The sighting was visually confirmed by a civilian source,The location of the sighting was St. Louis, Missouri.
